title: Modify individual cells without write permissions in Power BI
excerpt: In this video I am show you how to write back to a source you dont own. Links to mentioned sources:  Create an index with DAX: https://youtu.be/qUmTxQHr6nY  Create a rowid with dax:  https://youtu.be/WzpqBLApSBU  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE
